SHI: Aerospace Deivison Would Like to announce the completion of the F/A-122 Project. The project set out to build a High Altitude, High Mach capable Fighter/Attack aircraft that maintained maneuverability at low altitude as well. Endurance was a major concern as well. The Flight statistics for the Morpheus platform follow,

Role: Multi-Role Fighter/Attack Craft

Mission Profiles: Interception, Bombing, Air Superiority, Close Air Support

Ceiling: Estimated @ 12,500 meters +

Max Rated Speed: Mach 1.8+ (600m/s+)

Endurance: 300km+ (20 Minuets Continuous Flight Time+)

Take off Speed: 135m/s

F/A-122 C 'On the Flight Line'

F/A-122 C 'Climb to Cruise'

Craft File: SOON
I rebuild it and it worked great. Works even better with the Lazor system for guided flight
